sys_update_xml.name: sys_module_002b71782e5e430887d298111718e784
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_module"><sys_module action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><content><![CDATA[import { gs } from '@servicenow/glide';

/**
 * Business Rule script for auto-assigning incidents to SOW agents
 * @param {GlideRecord} current - The current incident record
 * @param {GlideRecord} previous - The previous incident record (for updates)
 */
export function autoAssignIncidentScript(current, previous) {
    try {
        // Only proceed if not already assigned
        if (current.assigned_to) {
            gs.debug('AutoAssignSOWAgent BR: Incident already assigned, skipping auto-assignment');
            return;
        }
        
        // Only proceed if assignment group is set
        if (!current.assignment_group) {
            gs.debug('AutoAssignSOWAgent BR: No assignment group set, skipping auto-assignment');
            return;
        }
        
        gs.info('AutoAssignSOWAgent BR: Triggering auto-assignment for incident: ' + current.sys_id);
        
        // Import the AutoAssignSOWAgent class
        const { AutoAssignSOWAgent } = require('./auto-assign-sow-agent.js');
        
        // Call the assignment logic
        const result = AutoAssignSOWAgent.assignIncident(current.sys_id.toString());
        
        if (result.success) {
            gs.info('AutoAssignSOWAgent BR: ' + result.message);
        } else {
            gs.info('AutoAssignSOWAgent BR: ' + result.message);
        }
        
    } catch (error) {
        gs.error('AutoAssignSOWAgent BR: Error in business rule: ' + error.message);
    }
}]]></content><external_source>false</external_source><path>x_1876443_autoassi/x-1876443-autoassignon/1.0.0/src/server/auto-assign-incident-script.js</path><sys_class_name>sys_module</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-11-28 06:44:04</sys_created_on><sys_id>002b71782e5e430887d298111718e784</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_1876443_autoassi/x-1876443-autoassignon/1.0.0/src/server/auto-assign-incident-script.js</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Autoassignon" source="x_1876443_autoassi">42e312ecc32132107a995312b4013184</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Autoassignon">42e312ecc32132107a995312b4013184</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_module_002b71782e5e430887d298111718e784</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-11-28 06:44:04</sys_updated_on></sys_module></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_module_3362fc58afc64234856446c81d32fea7
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_module"><sys_module action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><content><![CDATA[import { gs, GlideRecord, GlideDateTime } from '@servicenow/glide';

/**
 * AutoAssignSOWAgent - Core logic for automatic incident assignment
 * to available SOW agents
 */
export class AutoAssignSOWAgent {
    
    /**
     * Finds the best available SOW agent for an incident
     * @param {string} assignmentGroupId - The sys_id of the assignment group
     * @returns {Object} - {success: boolean, agentId: string, message: string}
     */
    static findAvailableAgent(assignmentGroupId) {
        try {
            gs.info('AutoAssignSOWAgent: Looking for available agents in group: ' + assignmentGroupId);
            
            if (!assignmentGroupId) {
                return {
                    success: false,
                    agentId: null,
                    message: 'No assignment group specified'
                };
            }
            
            // Get all group members
            const groupMembers = [];
            const grMember = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
            grMember.addQuery('group', assignmentGroupId);
            grMember.query();
            
            while (grMember.next()) {
                groupMembers.push(grMember.getValue('user'));
            }
            
            if (groupMembers.length === 0) {
                return {
                    success: false,
                    agentId: null,
                    message: 'No members found in assignment group'
                };
            }
            
            gs.info('AutoAssignSOWAgent: Found ' + groupMembers.length + ' group members');
            
            // Find available SOW agents from group members
            const grAgent = new GlideRecord('x_1876443_autoassi_u_agent_status');
            grAgent.addQuery('u_user', 'IN', groupMembers.join(','));
            grAgent.addQuery('u_is_logged_in', true);
            grAgent.addQuery('u_available_on_sow', true);
            grAgent.orderByDesc('u_last_seen'); // Most recently active first
            grAgent.query();
            
            if (grAgent.next()) {
                const agentId = grAgent.getValue('u_user');
                const agentName = grAgent.getDisplayValue('u_user');
                
                gs.info('AutoAssignSOWAgent: Found available agent: ' + agentName + ' (' + agentId + ')');
                
                return {
                    success: true,
                    agentId: agentId,
                    agentName: agentName,
                    message: 'Found available SOW agent: ' + agentName
                };
            }
            
            return {
                success: false,
                agentId: null,
                message: 'No available SOW agents found in assignment group'
            };
            
        } catch (error) {
            gs.error('AutoAssignSOWAgent: Error finding available agent: ' + error.message);
            return {
                success: false,
                agentId: null,
                message: 'Error occurred while finding available agent: ' + error.message
            };
        }
    }
    
    /**
     * Assigns an incident to an available SOW agent
     * @param {string} incidentId - The sys_id of the incident
     * @returns {Object} - {success: boolean, message: string}
     */
    static assignIncident(incidentId) {
        try {
            gs.info('AutoAssignSOWAgent: Processing incident assignment: ' + incidentId);
            
            const grIncident = new GlideRecord('incident');
            if (!grIncident.get(incidentId)) {
                return {
                    success: false,
                    message: 'Incident not found: ' + incidentId
                };
            }
            
            // Skip if already assigned
            if (grIncident.getValue('assigned_to')) {
                return {
                    success: false,
                    message: 'Incident already assigned to: ' + grIncident.getDisplayValue('assigned_to')
                };
            }
            
            const assignmentGroupId = grIncident.getValue('assignment_group');
            if (!assignmentGroupId) {
                return {
                    success: false,
                    message: 'No assignment group set on incident'
                };
            }
            
            const result = AutoAssignSOWAgent.findAvailableAgent(assignmentGroupId);
            
            if (result.success) {
                // Assign the incident
                grIncident.setValue('assigned_to', result.agentId);
                
                // Add work note
                const workNote = 'Assigned automatically to ' + result.agentName + 
                    ' by AutoAssignOnSOW (u_agent_status match).';
                grIncident.work_notes = workNote;
                
                grIncident.update();
                
                gs.info('AutoAssignSOWAgent: Successfully assigned incident ' + incidentId + 
                    ' to agent ' + result.agentName);
                
                return {
                    success: true,
                    message: workNote
                };
                
            } else {
                // Add work note indicating no agent found
                const workNote = 'No available SOW agent found in assignment group. Please assign manually.';
                grIncident.work_notes = workNote;
                grIncident.update();
                
                return {
                    success: false,
                    message: workNote
                };
            }
            
        } catch (error) {
            gs.error('AutoAssignSOWAgent: Error assigning incident: ' + error.message);
            return {
                success: false,
                message: 'Error occurred during assignment: ' + error.message
            };
        }
    }
    
    /**
     * Updates agent status (used by UI Action)
     * @param {string} userId - The sys_id of the user
     * @param {boolean} isLoggedIn - Login status
     * @param {boolean} availableOnSOW - SOW availability status
     * @param {string} notes - Optional notes
     * @returns {Object} - {success: boolean, message: string}
     */
    static updateAgentStatus(userId, isLoggedIn, availableOnSOW, notes) {
        try {
            const grAgent = new GlideRecord('x_1876443_autoassi_u_agent_status');
            grAgent.addQuery('u_user', userId);
            grAgent.query();
            
            const currentDateTime = new GlideDateTime().getDisplayValue();
            
            if (grAgent.next()) {
                // Update existing record
                grAgent.setValue('u_is_logged_in', isLoggedIn);
                grAgent.setValue('u_available_on_sow', availableOnSOW);
                grAgent.setValue('u_last_seen', currentDateTime);
                if (notes) {
                    grAgent.setValue('u_notes', notes);
                }
                grAgent.update();
                
                gs.info('AutoAssignSOWAgent: Updated status for user: ' + userId);
                
            } else {
                // Create new record
                grAgent.initialize();
                grAgent.setValue('u_user', userId);
                grAgent.setValue('u_is_logged_in', isLoggedIn);
                grAgent.setValue('u_available_on_sow', availableOnSOW);
                grAgent.setValue('u_last_seen', currentDateTime);
                if (notes) {
                    grAgent.setValue('u_notes', notes);
                }
                grAgent.insert();
                
                gs.info('AutoAssignSOWAgent: Created new status record for user: ' + userId);
            }
            
            return {
                success: true,
                message: 'Agent status updated successfully'
            };
            
        } catch (error) {
            gs.error('AutoAssignSOWAgent: Error updating agent status: ' + error.message);
            return {
                success: false,
                message: 'Error updating status: ' + error.message
            };
        }
    }
}]]></content><external_source>false</external_source><path>x_1876443_autoassi/x-1876443-autoassignon/1.0.0/src/server/auto-assign-sow-agent.js</path><sys_class_name>sys_module</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-11-28 06:44:04</sys_created_on><sys_id>3362fc58afc64234856446c81d32fea7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_1876443_autoassi/x-1876443-autoassignon/1.0.0/src/server/auto-assign-sow-agent.js</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Autoassignon" source="x_1876443_autoassi">42e312ecc32132107a995312b4013184</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Autoassignon">42e312ecc32132107a995312b4013184</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_module_3362fc58afc64234856446c81d32fea7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-11-28 06:44:04</sys_updated_on></sys_module></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1876443_autoassi.AutoAssignSOWAgentInclude</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Script Include for automatic incident assignment to available SOW agents</description><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>AutoAssignSOWAgentInclude</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[import { gs, GlideRecord, GlideDateTime } from '@servicenow/glide';

/**
 * AutoAssignSOWAgent - Core logic for automatic incident assignment
 * to available SOW agents
 */
export class AutoAssignSOWAgent {
    
    /**
     * Finds the best available SOW agent for an incident
     * @param {string} assignmentGroupId - The sys_id of the assignment group
     * @returns {Object} - {success: boolean, agentId: string, message: string}
     */
    static findAvailableAgent(assignmentGroupId) {
        try {
            gs.info('AutoAssignSOWAgent: Looking for available agents in group: ' + assignmentGroupId);
            
            if (!assignmentGroupId) {
                return {
                    success: false,
                    agentId: null,
                    message: 'No assignment group specified'
                };
            }
            
            // Get all group members
            const groupMembers = [];
            const grMember = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
            grMember.addQuery('group', assignmentGroupId);
            grMember.query();
            
            while (grMember.next()) {
                groupMembers.push(grMember.getValue('user'));
            }
            
            if (groupMembers.length === 0) {
                return {
                    success: false,
                    agentId: null,
                    message: 'No members found in assignment group'
                };
            }
            
            gs.info('AutoAssignSOWAgent: Found ' + groupMembers.length + ' group members');
            
            // Find available SOW agents from group members
            const grAgent = new GlideRecord('x_1876443_autoassi_u_agent_status');
            grAgent.addQuery('u_user', 'IN', groupMembers.join(','));
            grAgent.addQuery('u_is_logged_in', true);
            grAgent.addQuery('u_available_on_sow', true);
            grAgent.orderByDesc('u_last_seen'); // Most recently active first
            grAgent.query();
            
            if (grAgent.next()) {
                const agentId = grAgent.getValue('u_user');
                const agentName = grAgent.getDisplayValue('u_user');
                
                gs.info('AutoAssignSOWAgent: Found available agent: ' + agentName + ' (' + agentId + ')');
                
                return {
                    success: true,
                    agentId: agentId,
                    agentName: agentName,
                    message: 'Found available SOW agent: ' + agentName
                };
            }
            
            return {
                success: false,
                agentId: null,
                message: 'No available SOW agents found in assignment group'
            };
            
        } catch (error) {
            gs.error('AutoAssignSOWAgent: Error finding available agent: ' + error.message);
            return {
                success: false,
                agentId: null,
                message: 'Error occurred while finding available agent: ' + error.message
            };
        }
    }
    
    /**
     * Assigns an incident to an available SOW agent
     * @param {string} incidentId - The sys_id of the incident
     * @returns {Object} - {success: boolean, message: string}
     */
    static assignIncident(incidentId) {
        try {
            gs.info('AutoAssignSOWAgent: Processing incident assignment: ' + incidentId);
            
            const grIncident = new GlideRecord('incident');
            if (!grIncident.get(incidentId)) {
                return {
                    success: false,
                    message: 'Incident not found: ' + incidentId
                };
            }
            
            // Skip if already assigned
            if (grIncident.getValue('assigned_to')) {
                return {
                    success: false,
                    message: 'Incident already assigned to: ' + grIncident.getDisplayValue('assigned_to')
                };
            }
            
            const assignmentGroupId = grIncident.getValue('assignment_group');
            if (!assignmentGroupId) {
                return {
                    success: false,
                    message: 'No assignment group set on incident'
                };
            }
            
            const result = AutoAssignSOWAgent.findAvailableAgent(assignmentGroupId);
            
            if (result.success) {
                // Assign the incident
                grIncident.setValue('assigned_to', result.agentId);
                
                // Add work note
                const workNote = 'Assigned automatically to ' + result.agentName + 
                    ' by AutoAssignOnSOW (u_agent_status match).';
                grIncident.work_notes = workNote;
                
                grIncident.update();
                
                gs.info('AutoAssignSOWAgent: Successfully assigned incident ' + incidentId + 
                    ' to agent ' + result.agentName);
                
                return {
                    success: true,
                    message: workNote
                };
                
            } else {
                // Add work note indicating no agent found
                const workNote = 'No available SOW agent found in assignment group. Please assign manually.';
                grIncident.work_notes = workNote;
                grIncident.update();
                
                return {
                    success: false,
                    message: workNote
                };
            }
            
        } catch (error) {
            gs.error('AutoAssignSOWAgent: Error assigning incident: ' + error.message);
            return {
                success: false,
                message: 'Error occurred during assignment: ' + error.message
            };
        }
    }
    
    /**
     * Updates agent status (used by UI Action)
     * @param {string} userId - The sys_id of the user
     * @param {boolean} isLoggedIn - Login status
     * @param {boolean} availableOnSOW - SOW availability status
     * @param {string} notes - Optional notes
     * @returns {Object} - {success: boolean, message: string}
     */
    static updateAgentStatus(userId, isLoggedIn, availableOnSOW, notes) {
        try {
            const grAgent = new GlideRecord('x_1876443_autoassi_u_agent_status');
            grAgent.addQuery('u_user', userId);
            grAgent.query();
            
            const currentDateTime = new GlideDateTime().getDisplayValue();
            
            if (grAgent.next()) {
                // Update existing record
                grAgent.setValue('u_is_logged_in', isLoggedIn);
                grAgent.setValue('u_available_on_sow', availableOnSOW);
                grAgent.setValue('u_last_seen', currentDateTime);
                if (notes) {
                    grAgent.setValue('u_notes', notes);
                }
                grAgent.update();
                
                gs.info('AutoAssignSOWAgent: Updated status for user: ' + userId);
                
            } else {
                // Create new record
                grAgent.initialize();
                grAgent.setValue('u_user', userId);
                grAgent.setValue('u_is_logged_in', isLoggedIn);
                grAgent.setValue('u_available_on_sow', availableOnSOW);
                grAgent.setValue('u_last_seen', currentDateTime);
                if (notes) {
                    grAgent.setValue('u_notes', notes);
                }
                grAgent.insert();
                
                gs.info('AutoAssignSOWAgent: Created new status record for user: ' + userId);
            }
            
            return {
                success: true,
                message: 'Agent status updated successfully'
            };
            
        } catch (error) {
            gs.error('AutoAssignSOWAgent: Error updating agent status: ' + error.message);
            return {
                success: false,
                message: 'Error updating status: ' + error.message
            };
        }
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-11-28 06:44:04</sys_created_on><sys_id>e4fa82a7b5234e70af0672dc3ec18b0d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AutoAssignSOWAgentInclude</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Autoassignon" source="x_1876443_autoassi">42e312ecc32132107a995312b4013184</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Autoassignon">42e312ecc32132107a995312b4013184</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_e4fa82a7b5234e70af0672dc3ec18b0d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-11-28 06:44:04</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
